text: Fandas Shakirovich Safiullin (; 17 August 1936 – 10 October 2021) was a Russian politician. He was a member of the Fatherland – All Russia party. He was a member of the State Duma from 2000 to 2003. He was born in Tatar ASSR, Russian SFSR, Soviet Union. Safiullin died on 10 October 2021 in Kazan, Russia at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the State Duma Category:Politicians from Tatarstan
title: Fandas Safiullin
